headline: Rasoya Proteins' company secretary Sneha Shrivastava resigns
description: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that Ms. Sneha Shrivastava, Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company has resigned from the post with effect from February 01, 2017.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that Ms. Sneha Shrivastava, Company Secretary and Compliance Officer of the Company has resigned from the post with effect from February 01, 2017.The Board of Directors of the Company has considered the matter and noted it through resolution passed by circulation on February 01, 2017.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rasoya Proteins' board meeting on November 12, 2016
description: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 12, 2016, inter alia, to consider the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2016.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that the meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 12, 2016, inter alia, to consider the Un-audited Financial Results of the Company for the Second Quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2016.Further, as per the Company's Code of Conduct for Regulating, Monitoring and Reporting of Trading by Insiders of the Company under the Securities Exchange Board of India (Prohibition of insider Trading) Regulations, 2015 for Prevention of Insider Trading, the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed for all Directors/Officers/and Designated Employee of the Company from November 06, 2016 till the date of publication of financial results for the Second Quarter and half year ended on September 30, 2016 in the newspapers.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

headline: Rasoya Proteins' board meeting on November 06, 2015
description: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 06, 2015, to approve the unaudited quarterly financial results of the Company for the Second Quarter ended on September 30, 2015 and approval of text for advertisement to be published in newspapers.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 06, 2015, inter alia, to transact the following business:1. To approve the unaudited quarterly financial results of the Company for the Second Quarter ended on September 30, 2015 and approval of text for advertisement to be published in newspapers.2. To consider and approve Limited Review Report by Statutory Auditors on unaudited quarterly financial results for the Second Quarter ended on September 30, 2015.Further as per the Company's Code of Conduct for prohibition of Insider Trading, the trading window for dealing in the securities of the Company will be closed for all Directors/Officers/and Designated Employee of the Company from October 31, 2015 till the date of publication of financial results for the quarter ended September 30, 2015 in the newspapers.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rasoya Proteins: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rasoya Proteins has informed that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on August 14, 2015, has considered and approved the following businesses: 1. Considered and approved the revision in the remuneration of Mr. Anil Narayan Lonkar, Managing Director of the Company in case of inadequate profit or absence of profits.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on August 14, 2015, inter alia, has considered and approved the following businesses:1. Considered and approved the revision in the remuneration of Mr. Anil Narayan Lonkar, Managing Director of the Company in case of inadequate profit or absence of profits.2. Considered and approved the revision in the remuneration of Mr. Prashant Duchakke, Executive Director of the Company in case of inadequate profit or absence of profit.3. Considered and approved the Re-constitute the various committees of the Board viz. Audit Committee, Risk Management Committee, Independent Directors Committee, Nomination and Remuneration Committee, CSR Committee and Stakeholder Relationship Committee.4. Considered and approved related party transactions and recommend it to shareholders for their approval under section 188 of the Companies Act, 2013.5. Considered and approved the appointment of Mr. Sunil Purushottam Zore, Practising Company Secretary, as Scrutinizer for the purpose of declaration of results of E-Voting.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rasoya Proteins' Q2 results on November 14, 2014
description: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 14, 2014, to take on record and review of the proceedings of the meeting of Audit Committee, and Stakeholders Relationship Committee.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on November 14, 2014, inter alia, to transact the following business:1. To take on record and review of the proceedings of the meeting of Audit Committee, and Stakeholders Relationship Committee.2. To approve the Un-audited quarterly financial results of the Company for the second quarter ended on September 30, 2014 (Q2) and approval of text for advertisement to be published in newspapers.3. To consider and take on record the Share Capital Audit Report and other statutory compliances made by the Company for the quarter ended September 30, 2014 in terms of the various clauses of the listing agreement.4. To consider and approve the Limited Review Report by Auditors on Un-audited quarterly financial results of the Company for the second quarter ended on September 30, 2014.5. To consider and approve the appointment/revision in period of appointment of the Independent Directors of the Company in terms of New Companies act 2013.6. To consider and approve a new set of Article of Association of the Company containing regulations in conformity with the Companies Act, 2013 and recommend it to the members for adoption.7. To consider and approve alteration in object Clause of Memorandum of association of the Company by insertion of new objects.8. To consider and approve related party transactions and recommend it to shareholders for their approval under section 188 of the Companies Act, 2013.9. To consider and approve for shifting the place for keeping Register of members at place other than registered office.10. To consider about seeking members consent for the aforesaid matters through postal ballot.1. To consider and fix a cutoff date for sending postal Ballot Notice to the shareholders.12. To consider and approve the appointment of scrutinizer for the purpose of declaration of results of E-Voting and voting by ballot paper.Further in terms of SEBI (Prohibition of Insider Trading Regulations) 1992, the trading window for the directors and designated employees of the Company shall remain closed from November 06, 2014 to November 16, 2014 (both days inclusive).Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

headline: Rasoya Proteins: Outcome of board meeting
description: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on September 11, 2014, approved the appointment of Mrs. Manik Anil Lonkar as a Woman Director pursuant to section 149(1) and 152 of the Companies Act, 2013.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that the Board of Directors of the Company at its meeting held on September 11, 2014, transacted the following business:1. Approved the appointment of Mrs. Manik Anil Lonkar as a Woman Director pursuant to section 149(1) and 152 of the Companies Act, 2013.2. Constituted a Risk Management Committee pursuant to SEBI Circular April 17, 2014 and amended clause 49 of the Listing Agreement.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

headline: Rasoya Proteins: Board meeting on Sept 11, 2014
description: Rasoya Proteins has board meeting will be held on September 11, 2014, to transact the following business: 1. To consider and approve appointment of Mrs. Manik Anil Lonkar as a Woman Director in the Board of Directors u/s 149(1) proviso and 152(2) of the Companies Act 2013.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that a meeting of the Board of Directors of the Company will be held on September 11, 2014, inter alia, to transact the following business:1. To consider and approve appointment of Mrs. Manik Anil Lonkar as a Woman Director in the Board of Directors u/s 149(1) proviso and 152(2) of the Companies Act 2013.2. To constitute Risk Management Committee and draft Risk Management Policy pursuant to Clause 49(VI) of Listing agreement.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein

author: {'@type': 'Person', 'name': 'webtech_news18'}
headline: Rasoya Proteins: Updates on rating by CARE
description: Rasoya Proteins has informed that Credit Rating Agency, CARE has revised the rating from CARE BB+ to CARE BBB- assigned to the Long term Bank facilities of the Company and has revised the rating from CARE A4 to CARE A3 assigned to the short term Bank Facilities of the company.
articleBody: Rasoya Proteins Ltd has informed BSE that Credit Rating Agency, CARE has revised the rating from CARE BB+ (Double B Plus) to CARE BBB- (Triple B Minus) assigned to the Long term Bank facilities of the Company and has revised the rating from CARE A4 (A Four) to CARE A3 (A Three) assigned to the short term Bank Facilities of the company indicating moderate degree of safety regarding timely servicing of financial obligations. The Company has submitted to BSE the copy of letter issued by the CARE.Source : BSE Read all announcements in Rasoya Protein
